Class VillainsLair

  • java.lang.Object
    • Locations
      • VillainsLair

  • public class VillainsLair
extends Locations
    Date: May 17th 2018 This class creates Location, Villain's Lair. The VillainsLair class's parent class is Locations. This class creates a Villain's Lair for each city. Creates new instances of minigames and manages the outcome of the minigame by dealing damage to the relevant party.
    Author:
    Sachin Sakthivel and Sasiru Goonatillake

    • Constructor Detail

      • VillainsLair

        public VillainsLair​(boolean isFinal)
        Constructor method for VillainsLair. Sets the locations Name to "Villian's Lair" using parent class, Locations. If the input variable 'isFinal' is true, a new instance of finalVillain will be created under the variable 'villain' else a normal villain will be created under the same variable.
        Parameters:
        isFinal - Input Boolean variable which determines if the current city of the play through is the final City.

        travel in class Locations

      • gameResults

        public void gameResults​(boolean gameWon,
                        Hero hero,
                        Villain villain,
                        GameEnvironment game)
        This method determines the damage given out to either the Hero or the Villain depending on which party won the minigame. If Hero is killed, it will be removed off the Team
        Parameters:
        gameWon - Input Boolean variable which states whether the Hero won the minigame or not.
        hero - Input variable 'hero' of type Hero, which is the chosen Hero to fight the Villain in the minigame.
        villain - Input variable 'villains' of type Villain, which is the chosen Hero to fight the Hero in the minigame.
        game - Input variable 'game' of type GameEnviornment which inputs data about all aspects of the current game.

      • getVillain

        public Villain getVillain​()
        This method returns the Villain which resides in the current City.

      • villainInsight

        public java.lang.String villainInsight​()
        This method returns valuable information about the Villain which resides in the current City and returns it using String variable 'output'.
        Returns:
        Returns String variable 'output' containing information about the villain.
